{"canonical_id":"cut_content_combat_vo_bank","category":"npc","motifs":[{"slug":"flame","label":"Sacred Flame","category":"elemental","hits":7,"unique_lore":7},{"slug":"scarlet_rot","label":"Scarlet Rot Divinity","category":"cosmic","hits":5,"unique_lore":5},{"slug":"pilgrim","label":"Pilgrim & Journey","category":"archetypal","hits":2,"unique_lore":2}],"quotes":[{"lore_id":"0288b92ad44001ed","text":"We swat at flies, snuff out flame,","motifs":["Sacred Flame"]},{"lore_id":"1a2174311feb51d0","text":"Feral flame of Agheel, burn true...","motifs":["Sacred Flame"]},{"lore_id":"1a22e49e0f07b91a","text":"Blessed we, at your side, on this journey.","motifs":["Pilgrim & Journey"]}]}

{"canonical_id":"cut_content_guilbert_redeemer","category":"npc","motifs":[{"slug":"storm","label":"Storm & Tempest","category":"elemental","hits":2,"unique_lore":2}],"quotes":[{"lore_id":"15e5945ea9f0a7d9","text":"It must have been a dream. Strange.","motifs":["Dream & Reverie"]},{"lore_id":"76ef842515da926d","text":"There's an aberration of a blacksmith past the checkpoint that leads to Stormveil.","motifs":["Storm & Tempest"]},{"lore_id":"7d705bb8796c66b4","text":"That of all the grudges born of the Shattering, Malenia the Rotted is the object of the most profound.","motifs":["Scarlet Rot Divinity"]}]}

{"canonical_id":"npc:albus","category":"npc","motifs":[],"quotes":[{"lore_id":"2acc4a2d8e4a0d87","text":"Alas, this is the immovable fate of all Albinaurics.","motifs":["Primeval Current"]},{"lore_id":"3680c571a3f5b4a8","text":"It's only a quaint treasure, for we who cannot make the journey.","motifs":["Pilgrim & Journey"]}]}

{"canonical_id":"npc:asimi_silver_tear","category":"npc","motifs":[{"slug":"frost","label":"Frost & Hoarfrost","category":"elemental","hits":9,"unique_lore":9}],"quotes":[{"lore_id":"3d73082f1ff9e752","text":"And I vow, that when I perfect your form.","motifs":["Oaths & Vows"]},{"lore_id":"447464b83f089785","text":"Please, drink every last drop from the mother chalice.","motifs":["Frost & Hoarfrost"]},{"lore_id":"4a3a6296ff74bca9","text":"Our mother chalice.","motifs":["Frost & Hoarfrost"]}]}

{"canonical_id":"npc:aureliette","category":"npc","motifs":[],"quotes":[{"lore_id":"a6e7c2f13dca25fc","text":"Sister... Where did you go?","motifs":[]},{"lore_id":"e0d9623b005d418b","text":"You promised me. When we turned 14, we'd go to see the stars...","motifs":[]},{"lore_id":"a9a3fa4be30198c8","text":"I've been waiting ever so long. Forever and ever, it seems.","motifs":[]}]}

{"canonical_id":"npc:blackguard_boggart","category":"npc","motifs":[],"quotes":[{"lore_id":"1ceed54af3378450","text":"Alright then. It's yours, if you can meet me price.","motifs":["Frost & Hoarfrost"]},{"lore_id":"a2fd8edf24f780bc","text":"I ain't ever been more scared, neither. Rooted to the bloody spot...","motifs":["Roots & Veins"]}]}

{"canonical_id":"npc:blaidd","category":"npc","motifs":[{"slug":"primeval_current","label":"Primeval Current","category":"cosmic","hits":7,"unique_lore":7},{"slug":"gravity","label":"Gravity Wells","category":"elemental","hits":2,"unique_lore":2},{"slug":"frost","label":"Frost & Hoarfrost","category":"elemental","hits":2,"unique_lore":2},{"slug":"trickster","label":"Trickster & Mask","category":"archetypal","hits":2,"unique_lore":2}],"quotes":[{"lore_id":"06139c19f499fd89","text":"So Ranni's fate is kept in stasis by Starscourge Radahn...","motifs":["Gravity Wells","Primeval Current"]},{"lore_id":"10957fc2241bc4ee","text":"Seems we're fated to keep crossing paths.","motifs":["Primeval Current"]},{"lore_id":"11084d7f6414b9a7","text":"the fight against her fate she's dreamt of for so long.","motifs":["Dream & Reverie","Primeval Current"]}]}

{"canonical_id":"npc:bloody_finger_hunter_yura","category":"npc","motifs":[{"slug":"frost","label":"Frost & Hoarfrost","category":"elemental","hits":6,"unique_lore":6},{"slug":"flame","label":"Sacred Flame","category":"elemental","hits":3,"unique_lore":3},{"slug":"martyrdom","label":"Martyrdom & Sacrifice","category":"narrative","hits":2,"unique_lore":2},{"slug":"primeval_current","label":"Primeval Current","category":"cosmic","hits":2,"unique_lore":2}],"quotes":[{"lore_id":"11943a6e29ca971c","text":"If you inherit the flame of frenzy, your flesh will serve as kindling,","motifs":["Sacred Flame"]},{"lore_id":"1d22b1510d549be3","text":"The strength of a mighty dragon. Magnificent, but deadly.","motifs":["Frost & Hoarfrost"]},{"lore_id":"38dd8ea9fcc0a57c","text":"Perhaps we will meet again, if fate permits.","motifs":["Primeval Current"]}]}

{"canonical_id":"npc:boc_the_seamster","category":"npc","motifs":[{"slug":"frost","label":"Frost & Hoarfrost","category":"elemental","hits":5,"unique_lore":5}],"quotes":[{"lore_id":"168654d24077998c","text":"Please, do be safe on your journeys.","motifs":["Pilgrim & Journey"]},{"lore_id":"1e3eff4926d52397","text":"The story of my rotten life...","motifs":["Scarlet Rot Divinity"]},{"lore_id":"49762e12335c7587","text":"I, Boc the seamster, am forever in your service.","motifs":["Frost & Hoarfrost"]}]}

{"canonical_id":"npc:brother_corhyn","category":"npc","motifs":[{"slug":"trickster","label":"Trickster & Mask","category":"archetypal","hits":7,"unique_lore":7},{"slug":"frost","label":"Frost & Hoarfrost","category":"elemental","hits":2,"unique_lore":2}],"quotes":[{"lore_id":"03dbf0c153411a63","text":"From your description, it can be no other than the Goldmask himself!","motifs":["Trickster & Mask"]},{"lore_id":"04870771de3431f1","text":"I will soon leave to join the noble Goldmask.","motifs":["Trickster & Mask"]},{"lore_id":"0808820afe17d251","text":"Do you know of the noble Goldmask?","motifs":["Trickster & Mask"]}]}

{"canonical_id":"npc:d_hunter_of_the_dead","category":"npc","motifs":[{"slug":"scarlet_rot","label":"Scarlet Rot Divinity","category":"cosmic","hits":8,"unique_lore":8},{"slug":"root","label":"Roots & Veins","category":"botanical","hits":6,"unique_lore":6}],"quotes":[{"lore_id":"03e9858bbcdf3c64","text":"When grace is sullied, it rots people from the inside. Breaks them.","motifs":["Scarlet Rot Divinity"]},{"lore_id":"32ada4ba19444c00","text":"Ah, hello. You've been busy weeding Deathroot, I take it.","motifs":["Roots & Veins"]},{"lore_id":"3555385b17c06fca","text":"I thank you, as your brother-in-arms.","motifs":["Scarlet Rot Divinity"]}]}

{"canonical_id":"npc:edgar","category":"npc","motifs":[],"quotes":[{"lore_id":"04d8a307dde44988","text":"And that is how fate has answered…","motifs":["Primeval Current"]},{"lore_id":"761b7cf86232dcf2","text":"They gave me good service, or so I thought,\nbut it seems it was all an act.","motifs":["Frost & Hoarfrost"]},{"lore_id":"8c7e3bc7e235e47d","text":"I'm Edgar, warden of this castle as ordained by Lord Godrick himself.","motifs":["Guardian & Threshold"]}]}

After you snuff it...","motifs":[]},{"lore_id":"5fa0cf0dccd573a7","text":"<screaming>","motifs":[]}]}

{"canonical_id":"npc:fia","category":"npc","motifs":[],"quotes":[{"lore_id":"0dfacee93cf6dcde","text":"So it is, that any loathing, any hatred that overshadows them...","motifs":["Oaths & Vows"]},{"lore_id":"4202cb9a70d8d0dd","text":"They call me a foul and rotten witch.","motifs":["Scarlet Rot Divinity"]},{"lore_id":"50bfc1e898d78cb3","text":"The blessing is still aflame in your breast, dear.","motifs":["Sacred Flame"]}]}

{"canonical_id":"npc:finger_reader_enia","category":"npc","motifs":[{"slug":"flame","label":"Sacred Flame","category":"elemental","hits":3,"unique_lore":3}],"quotes":[{"lore_id":"3ddbe1451a8d6e18","text":"\"Great Elden Ring, root of the Golden Order.\"","motifs":["Roots & Veins"]},{"lore_id":"628360929a913dd3","text":"Only the smoldering flame in the Great Forge of the Giants, on the highest peak in the Lands Between, can burn the Erdtree.","motifs":["Fungus & Mycelia","Sacred Flame"]},{"lore_id":"d86100d69e558636","text":"But special kindling is required to reignite the flame.","motifs":["Sacred Flame"]}]}

I thought I'd never wrench that thing open.","motifs":[]},{"lore_id":"d54aa09cbd42558e","text":"You're the finest customer a man ever had!","motifs":[]},{"lore_id":"09d83afae1337ee4","text":"You there.","motifs":[]}]}

{"canonical_id":"npc:gideon_ofnir","category":"npc","motifs":[{"slug":"scarlet_rot","label":"Scarlet Rot Divinity","category":"cosmic","hits":6,"unique_lore":6},{"slug":"sap","label":"Sap & Flow","category":"botanical","hits":3,"unique_lore":3},{"slug":"flame","label":"Sacred Flame","category":"elemental","hits":3,"unique_lore":3},{"slug":"frost","label":"Frost & Hoarfrost","category":"elemental","hits":3,"unique_lore":3}],"quotes":[{"lore_id":"06cb1f8ce8367c0d","text":"Make the journey.","motifs":["Pilgrim & Journey"]},{"lore_id":"19e316d77898d409","text":"To pass the impenetrable thorns, you seek the forge of the flame of ruin, in the snowy mountaintops of the giants.","motifs":["Sacred Flame","Thorns & Brambles"]},{"lore_id":"4132fb2291aa3b30","text":"The Great Rune dwells within the amber egg that was Radagon's gift to her.","motifs":["Sap & Flow"]}]}

{"canonical_id":"npc:gowry","category":"npc","motifs":[{"slug":"frost","label":"Frost & Hoarfrost","category":"elemental","hits":31,"unique_lore":31},{"slug":"scarlet_rot","label":"Scarlet Rot Divinity","category":"cosmic","hits":17,"unique_lore":17},{"slug":"primeval_current","label":"Primeval Current","category":"cosmic","hits":4,"unique_lore":4},{"slug":"pilgrim","label":"Pilgrim & Journey","category":"archetypal","hits":2,"unique_lore":2}],"quotes":[{"lore_id":"083033a717975a74","text":"But the rotting sickness erodes one's memory.","motifs":["Scarlet Rot Divinity"]},{"lore_id":"1282496de9e21a76","text":"Oh how I have counted the days. Millicent shall soon meet her sisters.","motifs":["Frost & Hoarfrost"]},{"lore_id":"178231e67fa13fdf","text":"Do you have an interest in rot incantations?","motifs":["Scarlet Rot Divinity"]}]}

{"canonical_id":"npc:gurranq_beast_clergyman","category":"npc","motifs":[{"slug":"scarlet_rot","label":"Scarlet Rot Divinity","category":"cosmic","hits":3,"unique_lore":3},{"slug":"dream","label":"Dream & Reverie","category":"cosmic","hits":3,"unique_lore":3},{"slug":"twin","label":"Twinship & Mirrors","category":"narrative","hits":2,"unique_lore":2}],"quotes":[{"lore_id":"06b00a1acccc05ab","text":"Now, rot!","motifs":["Scarlet Rot Divinity"]},{"lore_id":"1ae84907f1332c7f","text":"The twin prodigies, Miquella and Malenia.","motifs":["Twinship & Mirrors"]},{"lore_id":"27809fc148744444","text":"I dreamt for so long.","motifs":["Dream & Reverie"]}]}

{"canonical_id":"npc:imprisoned_merchant","category":"npc","motifs":[{"slug":"pilgrim","label":"Pilgrim & Journey","category":"archetypal","hits":3,"unique_lore":3}],"quotes":[{"lore_id":"030de8ef52fdd110","text":"Of the swiftness of a wanderer's fury.","motifs":["Pilgrim & Journey"]},{"lore_id":"2d5184bec10f2779","text":"Stay away, Us wanderers have had enough.","motifs":["Pilgrim & Journey"]},{"lore_id":"4ac29795dd84d719","text":"How nice of you to stop by, again.","motifs":["Frost & Hoarfrost"]}]}

{"canonical_id":"npc:intro_storyteller","category":"npc","motifs":[{"slug":"flame","label":"Sacred Flame","category":"elemental","hits":11,"unique_lore":11},{"slug":"pilgrim","label":"Pilgrim & Journey","category":"archetypal","hits":4,"unique_lore":4},{"slug":"frost","label":"Frost & Hoarfrost","category":"elemental","hits":3,"unique_lore":3},{"slug":"thorn","label":"Thorns & Brambles","category":"botanical","hits":2,"unique_lore":2}],"quotes":[{"lore_id":"08b7cab24ce9d037","text":"I wish to journey with you once more.","motifs":["Pilgrim & Journey"]},{"lore_id":"0eb5f47f339108de","text":"Our journey together ends here.","motifs":["Pilgrim & Journey"]},{"lore_id":"184b5370b2495aa4","text":"The thorns are impenetrable.","motifs":["Thorns & Brambles"]}]}

{"canonical_id":"npc:irina","category":"npc","motifs":[{"slug":"flame","label":"Sacred Flame","category":"elemental","hits":4,"unique_lore":4},{"slug":"pilgrim","label":"Pilgrim & Journey","category":"archetypal","hits":2,"unique_lore":2}],"quotes":[{"lore_id":"008f636eb7b3a098","text":"Burn me with the flame, to make me your maiden...","motifs":["Sacred Flame"]},{"lore_id":"00ad8fa50374eca4","text":"May the flame of chaos find purchase within you.","motifs":["Sacred Flame"]},{"lore_id":"4b1b5e36ac1d1350","text":"My sole wish is that he escape,\neven if his honour should be the price.","motifs":["Frost & Hoarfrost"]}]}

{"canonical_id":"npc:iron_fist_alexander","category":"npc","motifs":[{"slug":"frost","label":"Frost & Hoarfrost","category":"elemental","hits":7,"unique_lore":7},{"slug":"scarlet_rot","label":"Scarlet Rot Divinity","category":"cosmic","hits":5,"unique_lore":5},{"slug":"flame","label":"Sacred Flame","category":"elemental","hits":4,"unique_lore":4},{"slug":"pilgrim","label":"Pilgrim & Journey","category":"archetypal","hits":3,"unique_lore":3}],"quotes":[{"lore_id":"09d6910557f4d04b","text":"Ahh, hello! {"canonical_id":"npc:jar_bairn","category":"npc","motifs":[{"slug":"frost","label":"Frost & Hoarfrost","category":"elemental","hits":5,"unique_lore":5},{"slug":"pilgrim","label":"Pilgrim & Journey","category":"archetypal","hits":3,"unique_lore":3},{"slug":"scarlet_rot","label":"Scarlet Rot Divinity","category":"cosmic","hits":2,"unique_lore":2}],"quotes":[{"lore_id":"0c61d1a2c9945cf9","text":"The flowers we have now are nice, but it's a bit boring having the same ones all the time.","motifs":["Frost & Hoarfrost"]},{"lore_id":"12e281411e8ffa46","text":"Even if I'm scared, I'll still fight to protect everyone.","motifs":["Scarlet Rot Divinity"]},{"lore_id":"1742b1ee8458ac9c","text":"One who protects everybody.","motifs":["Scarlet Rot Divinity"]}]}

{"canonical_id":"npc:kenneth_haight","category":"npc","motifs":[{"slug":"frost","label":"Frost & Hoarfrost","category":"elemental","hits":5,"unique_lore":5}],"quotes":[{"lore_id":"06774e10c34890a0","text":"Oh, indeed, it is a foul fate for a land, to be without a ruler.","motifs":["Primeval Current"]},{"lore_id":"3e994115ca5df632","text":"Ah, nice to see you after so long.","motifs":["Frost & Hoarfrost"]},{"lore_id":"69c885a48e586c49","text":"Hmph, yes, now allow me to furnish you with a little advice.","motifs":["Frost & Hoarfrost"]}]}

{"canonical_id":"npc:miriel_pastor_of_vows","category":"npc","motifs":[{"slug":"oath","label":"Oaths & Vows","category":"narrative","hits":6,"unique_lore":6},{"slug":"sap","label":"Sap & Flow","category":"botanical","hits":3,"unique_lore":3}],"quotes":[{"lore_id":"0bce632e8bb0dda0","text":"How it came to be known as the Church of Vows?","motifs":["Oaths & Vows"]},{"lore_id":"258a8aa84f746e1d","text":"I welcome you, to the Church of Vows.","motifs":["Oaths & Vows"]},{"lore_id":"325bf00e594e7ebf","text":"It is here, at the Church of Vows, that the great houses of the Erdtree and the Moon were joined.","motifs":["Oaths & Vows"]}]}

{"canonical_id":"npc:ranni","category":"npc","motifs":[{"slug":"frost","label":"Frost & Hoarfrost","category":"elemental","hits":12,"unique_lore":12},{"slug":"primeval_current","label":"Primeval Current","category":"cosmic","hits":5,"unique_lore":5},{"slug":"trickster","label":"Trickster & Mask","category":"archetypal","hits":3,"unique_lore":3},{"slug":"dream","label":"Dream & Reverie","category":"cosmic","hits":2,"unique_lore":2}],"quotes":[{"lore_id":"0d88a2f891bd75ba","text":"Surrendering thyself into the service of a doll-witch...","motifs":["Frost & Hoarfrost"]},{"lore_id":"0d9af185296d4506","text":"With a fateful wound, ne'er to heal.","motifs":["Primeval Current"]},{"lore_id":"0fe10b4f1d83d039","text":"Even in my slumber, I sensed it.","motifs":["Dream & Reverie"]}]}

{"canonical_id":"npc:rhico_dreambrew_apostle","category":"npc","motifs":[{"slug":"dream","label":"Dream & Reverie","category":"cosmic","hits":19,"unique_lore":19}],"quotes":[{"lore_id":"0b350d629a94de22","text":"Perhaps you've heard of dreambrew, the nectar of the demigods, once forbidden to we mortals?","motifs":["Dream & Reverie"]},{"lore_id":"100f5cfdd2ec8739","text":"As I said, if you'd like me to share some dreambrew with you, we'll need four doses of slumber fog, or thereabouts.","motifs":["Dream & Reverie"]},{"lore_id":"281d17d1ef668797","text":"Into your dream, the world of your heart.","motifs":["Dream & Reverie"]}]}

{"canonical_id":"npc:sorcerer_rogier","category":"npc","motifs":[{"slug":"frost","label":"Frost & Hoarfrost","category":"elemental","hits":8,"unique_lore":8},{"slug":"primeval_current","label":"Primeval Current","category":"cosmic","hits":5,"unique_lore":5},{"slug":"storm","label":"Storm & Tempest","category":"elemental","hits":3,"unique_lore":3},{"slug":"martyrdom","label":"Martyrdom & Sacrifice","category":"narrative","hits":2,"unique_lore":2}],"quotes":[{"lore_id":"0fe04b6d05effb30","text":"If Lunar Princess Ranni truly is the one who plotted that fateful night,","motifs":["Primeval Current"]},{"lore_id":"1240226e2ae30abf","text":"And the best way to find out is for you to enter her service and take a poke around on the sly.","motifs":["Frost & Hoarfrost"]},{"lore_id":"15398b18c33a3de6","text":"But enough about me, what are you doing here in Stormveil Castle?","motifs":["Storm & Tempest"]}]}

{"canonical_id":"npc:tanith","category":"npc","motifs":[{"slug":"sap","label":"Sap & Flow","category":"botanical","hits":2,"unique_lore":2}],"quotes":[{"lore_id":"02395f149ad00389","text":"If you are loath to hunt your own kin, so be it.","motifs":["Oaths & Vows"]},{"lore_id":"08846fb3ae66155d","text":"Rya will be disappointed, but I won't twist your arm.","motifs":["Sap & Flow"]},{"lore_id":"435993754c14c9cb","text":"I will transport you to the Lord's chamber.","motifs":["Sap & Flow"]}]}

{"canonical_id":"npc:viscount_shanehaight","category":"npc","motifs":[{"slug":"frost","label":"Frost & Hoarfrost","category":"elemental","hits":2,"unique_lore":2}],"quotes":[{"lore_id":"054d46ca001ff211","text":"I didn't notice that you were Tarnished.","motifs":["Frost & Hoarfrost"]},{"lore_id":"4d8a5bd8f9cbdd0b","text":"Well, you've done us a fine service, I must say.","motifs":["Frost & Hoarfrost"]},{"lore_id":"beb1f9b72c995ee2","text":"the traitors were eyed by the grotesque Fell Omen, and their corpses piled high outside the wall!","motifs":["Scarlet Rot Divinity"]}]}

{"canonical_id":"npc:white_mask_varre","category":"npc","motifs":[{"slug":"storm","label":"Storm & Tempest","category":"elemental","hits":6,"unique_lore":6},{"slug":"sap","label":"Sap & Flow","category":"botanical","hits":5,"unique_lore":5},{"slug":"frost","label":"Frost & Hoarfrost","category":"elemental","hits":2,"unique_lore":2},{"slug":"primeval_current","label":"Primeval Current","category":"cosmic","hits":2,"unique_lore":2}],"quotes":[{"lore_id":"070a598ef18ed60b","text":"To Castle Stormveil, on the cliff.","motifs":["Storm & Tempest"]},{"lore_id":"07b4a710382ac4f7","text":"For an audience with the Two Fingers, in the inner chamber.","motifs":["Sap & Flow"]},{"lore_id":"0e99bf8aa9594267","text":"You disappoint me.","motifs":["Sap & Flow"]}]}

{"canonical_id":"npc:witch_hunter_jerren","category":"npc","motifs":[{"slug":"primeval_current","label":"Primeval Current","category":"cosmic","hits":5,"unique_lore":5},{"slug":"scarlet_rot","label":"Scarlet Rot Divinity","category":"cosmic","hits":3,"unique_lore":3},{"slug":"glintstone","label":"Glintstone & Crystalline","category":"elemental","hits":2,"unique_lore":2}],"quotes":[{"lore_id":"094b71de5d85ba63","text":"If the fates deign it, may we meet again, Tarnished.","motifs":["Primeval Current"]},{"lore_id":"37ad8750ea393708","text":"Obsessed by the primeval current, countless sorcerers fell to her hand.","motifs":["Glintstone & Crystalline","Primeval Current"]},{"lore_id":"5f3974a4b7e73322","text":"Brave warrior, if the fates deign it...","motifs":["Primeval Current"]}]}
